ing: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger cinnamon whiskey (such as FireballÂ®)
1/2 fluid ounce spiced rum (such as Captain Morgan'sÂ®)
4 fluid ounces cola-flavored carbonated beverage, or as needed
des: "I have recently found a love for mixology and experimenting with new and wild alcohol flavors. Substitute diet soda if desired."
ins: Pour whiskey and rum into a high ball glass; stir well. Top drink with cola.
